text: Bako is a genus of lace bugs in the family Tingidae. There are about nine described species in Bako. ==Species== * Bako arabianus Rodrigues, 1987 * Bako capeneri Drake, 1956 * Bako dieides Drake & Ruhoff, 1961 * Bako distinctus Rodrigues, 1981 * Bako editus Drake, 1956 * Bako lebruni Schouteden, 1923 * Bako lepidus Rodrigues, 1981 * Bako linnavuorii Rodrigues, 1977 * Bako malayanus (Drake, 1947) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Tingidae
title: Bako (bug)
